text:
i am getting some issue regarding AJAX request from my forms to web API.

 it always says : Response to preflight request doesn't pass access control check: No 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header is present on the requested resource

What API are you trying to access?  This s very likely by design as any HubSpot API that requires authentication blocks you from accessing it from the front end to prevent you from exposing an API key or Access Token in the front end of your app/website

I feel like what I’m trying to do here is pretty simple, but I’m not having much luck.

Trying to figure out how the get the selected `option` from a HS form `select` field using JS, but the properties on the `option` doesn’t change when it’s selected.

Any ideas?

Hi,
I feel that what I'm trying to do here is very simple, but I'm not having much luck.
I need to trigger an email to a contact list from an action outside the HubSpot. The email will have personalized content with each shot and so I'm trying to find a solution where I can send an object with the information and receive it in the email template. It is possible?
I think what you are looking for is Transactional Emails. This will allow you to personalize the object before you send it to HS with fields outside of what HS allows.
<@U01C87PNTDE> is there another way such as sending email via API with customized body or only with transactional?
HS only allows that via transactional, unfortunately <@U01HTGG05HV>
you could always use something like MailGun which allows that, but then you loose all of the tracking that HS provides
hum okay, thanks for your help. I need purchase this module.
Yeah, in HS I would have everything really centered
i am using .net api to get my customize json object.from HubSpot web page. but i got same error every time when i hit my .net api as i explained above.
